reqs: Pre-reqs: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102. (or (c) 6 credits of 200-level psychology (but not PSYC 205 or 263).)
description: The application of psychological theory and research to legal issues and the criminal justice system. Credit will be granted for only one of PSYC 331 or PSYC 430.
